name: eu_leg_dim_parameter
title: Parameters for greenhouse gas emission projections submitted under EU legislation
description: This table matches parameters for greenhouse gas emission projections submitted under EU legislation to default units and to a parameter group according to the parameter template. It also takes into account parameters added by Member States and which were not originally listed in the parameter template.

sources.title: Common Data Repository on Eionet
sources.description: The CDR holds data reported under various European legislation.

sources.title: Reportnet 3 - National projections of anthropogenic greenhouse gas emissions – Reporting year 2021
sources.description: National projections provided by European Member States, pursuant to Governance Regulation Art.18 (1)(b) / Implementing Regulation Art.38

licenses.name: ODC-by license or similar
licenses.title: Open Data Commons Attribution License - or similar
